keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work with employers to provide apprenticeships and encourage young people to get the best start in life.
Pressure Ministers and work with the Council to secure funding to fill empty shops, bring money into Stoke and Hanley.
Build on the recent £17.6 million investment into the Royal Stoke. Increasing bed numbers.
Work with the Police and community groups to crack down on anti-social behaviour. Campaign for as many of the 20,000 new Police being recruited nationally to come to Stoke-on-Trent.
Sort out our local bus problem, so we have more frequent services. Improve the train service through Stoke. Campaign to upgrade junction 15 of the M6, reducing congestion.
Get Brexit done so we can focus on our local priorities for Stoke-on-Trent.

issues.brexitEurope: Get Brexit done so we can focus on our local priorities for Stoke-on-Trent.
